title: Oberoi Group exits UAE
description: The Oberoi Group will cease managing The Oberoi Beach Resort, Al Zorah, as the contract with owner investors ends. Employees have been informed, and discussions are underway with other hotel chains. This follows a similar transition in Dubai and occurs amid an inheritance dispute within the Oberoi family.
